QueryResult.text: ( select SRMRES1.id, SRMRES1.last_name last_name, SRMRES1.first_name first_name, CMNV.name person_type, CMNV.language_code LANGUAGE_CODE, max(decode(PRRLEST.PRISPRIMARY,0,null,SRMRES2.last_name)) primary_role, SRMRES1.UNIQUE_NAME, SRMRES1.RESOURCE_TYPE from SRM_RESOURCES SRMRES1, SRM_RESOURCES SRMRES2, PRROLESET PRRLEST, PRJ_RESOURCES PRJRES, CMN_LOOKUPS_V CMNV where SRMRES1.id = PRJRES.prid (+) and NVL(PRJRES.PRISROLE,0) = 0 and SRMRES1.id = PRRLEST.PRRESOURCEID (+) and PRRLEST.PRROLEID = SRMRES2.id (+) and SRMRES1.person_type = CMNV.id and SRMRES1.is_active != 0 group by SRMRES1.id, SRMRES1.last_name, SRMRES1.first_name, SRMRES1.UNIQUE_NAME, CMNV.name, CMNV.language_code, SRMRES1.resource_type )
